definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: He maketh my feet like hinds' feet: and setteth me upon my high places.
sentences.chinese: 他使我的脚快如母鹿的蹄，又使我在高处安稳。

sentences.english: It's been worth every minute of it. Now I can retire in peace.
sentences.chinese: 每一分钟都是值得的，我现在可以安稳退休了。

sentences.english: The fire made us feel very snug.
sentences.chinese: 那火使我们觉得非常安稳。

sentences.english: He that would live in peace and ease, must not speak all the knows, nor judge all he sees.
sentences.chinese: 若想生活得平静安稳，对于所见所闻就不要妄加评论。

sentences.english: This reserve is earning "a pittance," he says. "But we sleep well."
sentences.chinese: 他说，这笔储备赚钱很少，但保证“我们睡的安稳”。

sentences.english: For even as He loves the arrows that flies, so He loves also the bow that is stable.
sentences.chinese: 因为他爱那飞出的箭，一如他爱那安稳的弓。

sentences.english: The cat ensconced itself in the armchair.
sentences.chinese: 猫安安稳稳地蹲在扶手椅里。

sentences.english: Settle down, see more of their daughter.
sentences.chinese: 安稳下来，多点照看他们的女儿。

sentences.english: This is a place where a photographer can never sleep in peace.
sentences.chinese: 摄影师一旦到了南极，就永远别想睡个安稳觉。

sentences.english: When peace, like a river, attendeth my way, when sorrows like sea billows roll;
sentences.chinese: 有时如河流，我心平静安稳，有时忧伤来似浪滚。

sentences.english: Jack tightly around her waist and make her stand.
sentences.chinese: 杰克紧紧地搂着她的腰，使她站得安稳。

sentences.english: Our love in the blundering world gradually find the initial stability.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱在浮动不安的世界里垂垂找到了最初的安稳。

sentences.english: B: It's been worth every minute of it. Now I can retire in peace.
sentences.chinese: 每一分钟都是值得的，我现在可以安稳退休了。

sentences.english: Faith in Christ will keep us steady in the stormy sea of change.
sentences.chinese: 生命虽经狂风骤雨，信靠基督使我们安稳无惧。

sentences.english: I'm goin to say that not only will she be able to have an abortion, she'll be able to have you put to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我敢说她不仅将能够堕胎，而且还能让你睡个安稳觉。

sentences.english: The little children sat on the sledge steadily with their elder brother pulling from in the front.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子安稳地坐在冰床上，哥哥在前面使劲儿拉。

definition: Anting township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
at ease/to feel relieved/to set one's mind at rest/to keep one's mind on sth
Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
content with one's lot/knowing one's place
to be content with one's lot (idiom)/to know one's place
Anle district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
